outline:
1. to totter, shake, slip
    1. (Qal) to totter, shake, slip
    2. (Niphal) to be shaken, be moved, be overthrown
    3. (Hiphil) to dislodge, let fall, drop
    4. (Hithpael) to be greatly shaken
kjv_def: be carried, cast, be out of course, be fallen in decay, [idiom] exceedingly, fall(-ing down), be (re-) moved, be ready, shake, slide, slip.
strongs_def: to waver; by implication, to slip, shake, fall
